page.title: 12Haughton Playgroup
page.content: A playgroup is very important for young children because they can learn about and do many things that would be difficult to do at home.They meet other children and make friends.The playgroup in Haughton is in the village hall on Tuesday,Wednesday and Thursday mornings During the week 36 children go,there are 5 adults looking after them.When we visited them we saw a lovely Wendy House,with 4 rooms,climbing frame,sea- saw,rocking horse,sandpit,trampoline, and dressing up clothes.In the kitchen the children were painting,playing with pastry,drawing and glueing.They were able to choose what they wanted to do and were all enjoying themselves.They had a drink of milk and a biscuit before hearing a story and singing songs or playing instruments.Each child pays 80pence a morning to go.
